name: ribbons (demo)
description:
a dialogue-driven puzzle platformer about anonymous online birds and a former friend whom you've grown apart from

team

@ttanatb - code

@zephyo - art + code

note - this is a demo! we weren't able to complete the whole thing in time. But the finished version will have an ending and be built for Mac + Linux,  we promise.

--

known bugs

- going to "controls" via "options" causes a game-breaking bug of input not being recieved! because of the 48 hour time limit, we weren't able to squash this one in time. if you encounter this one, please delete your PlayerPrefs (whose location is described here) and restart.

- the end of the 2nd level doesnt work! thats cause that's the end of the demo (we didnt get time to show a screen that says 'end of demo', haha oops)
